name: HNB Adhishtana
details: Start saving in a new way Start saving in a new way with HNB Adhishtana, a unique savings account that will allow senders of remittances from Middle East and Gulf Region and receivers in Sri Lanka to gain a host of benefits and services through a savings account. What HNB Adhishtana can offer you? Higher interest rates based on the account balances Free Internet banking for the first year Free mobile banking for one year Free HNB Visa International Debit Card Immediate loan facilities of up to 90% of your account balance
